ygData.subject: Re: Intensify Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Screaming terror is due to be fixed soon. Not neccessarily fixed but improved. Instead of there being a seperate chance to resist the fear and the Mez
ygData.messageBody:
Screaming terror is due to be fixed soon. Not neccessarily fixed but
improved. Instead of there being a seperate chance to resist the fear and
the Mez componenets, it will be an all or nothing resist at the beginning.

Now if they fail they run off screaming in fear, but do not remember who
did it to them so when the fear wears off they stop where they are non
aggressive. A greatly useful spell for crowd control, especially in
dungeons.

Bullseye

Don Allejundro De Academie Castille

Mirumoto Oushime-Dragon Clan Go Master

Rictus-VZ


----------
> From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Intensify Death
> Date: Saturday, September 11, 1999 10:33 AM
>
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Well if your not a Dark Elf Necro then I would also pick up Shadow Sight.
> Also if your planning on going to perma in the future I would get resist
> cold to help you out there. Other then that the rest of the spells are
> useless. Definitly get Poison Shock it does 169 in dd and actually makes
> Necros good at dd for awhile.
>
> Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 37th Circle
>
> -----Original Message-----

Screaming
> >terror. Buy the shield spells, Greater Shielding and Leatherskinn. The

(like
> >6gold ea). rest are useless.
> >
